text: Taksim Spor Kulübü is a sports club located in Beyoğlu, Istanbul, Turkey. The football team of the club plays in the Istanbul Super Amateur League. The club was founded in 1940 by mostly members of the Armenian community of Istanbul when Ateş-Güneş, Nor Şişli and Kalespor clubs merged. The club has had players of Armenian, Jewish and Greek descent as well as other Turkish players in its history.Hrant Dink's club ==Attendances== * Istanbul Amateur League: 1940–67 * Turkey Second League: 1967–68 * Turkey Third League: 1968–74 * Istanbul (Super) Amateur League: 2016–... ==See also== *Garo Hamamcıoğlu ==References== ==External links== *Official Website *Team info @TFF.org Category:Football clubs in Istanbul Category:Association football clubs established in 1940 Category:Sport in Beyoğlu Category:1940 establishments in Turkey
title: Taksim S.K.
